title: Colombia Core Inflation Rate
description: Core consumer prices in Colombia increased 10.04 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Core Inflation Rate in Colombia averaged 5.02 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 10.04 percent in September of 2022 and a record low of 1.67 percent in March of 2021. This page provides - Colombia Core Inflation Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco de la Republica de Colombia
